price: 91. Honorez l’engagement envers Allah une fois que vous l’avez pris. Ne vous parjurez point après avoir solennellement prêté serment et pris Allah pour garant. Car Allah Sait ce que vous faites.
arabic: وَأَوۡفُواْ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا عَٰهَدتُّمۡ وَلَا تَنقُضُواْ ٱلۡأَيۡمَٰنَ بَعۡدَ تَوۡكِيدِهَا وَقَدۡ جَعَلۡتُمُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَفِيلًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-awfū biʿahdi al-lahi idhā ʿāhadttum walā tanquḍū al-aymāna baʿda tawkīdihā waqad jaʿaltumu al-laha ʿalaykum kafīlan inna al-laha yaʿlamu mā tafʿalūna
